subject: Re: [junit] Mock HTTP Server
msgSnippet: ... I ve also found Jetty to be very good for testing.  The API is ok and the documentation is very good. You can use it to test client-side code by running a
messageBody:
2009/1/31 James Abley <james.abley@...>:
> I've been happy using both Jetty and ServletUnit (part of httpunit).

I've also found Jetty to be very good for testing. The API is ok and
the documentation is very good.

You can use it to test client-side code by running a servlet that the
test primes with pre-canned responses for different URLs. You can
also use it to test server-side code by starting up a servlet you want
to test, and the test can then make HTTP requests to it.

--Nat

--
http://www.natpryce.com
